snippet.title: Avast: Scourge of the Sea | Mother Direct June 2020
snippet.description:
The footage shown was part of the June 2020 Mother Direct, a broadcast intended to celebrate indie RPGs and their inspirations. Avast: Scourge of the Sea is a pirate themed RPG. Pirates are being kidnapped left and right at the hands of the Lantern Men—strange beings whose origins are unknown. But, the discovery of a mysterious Pendant may turn the tides in this deadly game... Meet exciting new friends and dangerous foes as you learn the dark secrets of the Lookout Isles and the Lantern Men!

You can follow the game's progress on Twitter https://twitter.com/avast_game and IndieDB https://www.indiedb.com/games/avast-scourge-of-the-sea !

Check out the other games from the direct on the Mother Forever YouTube channel too: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfGZdcg_pVcnuA5x1o_0zzQ
